veggievibes.short: An interactive showcase for finding vegetarian and vegan recipes.
veggievibes.long: VeggieVibes is a project developed to explore API calls using Spoonacular and experiment with React Router v7. It includes debounce and AbortController for better UX.

pennywise.short: A simple, intuitive app for tracking daily expenses.
pennywise.long: PennyWise lets you add items, view your list, and see the total cost instantly. A great project to deepen your understanding of state management in React.

taskflow.short: List of todos to handle daily activities.
taskflow.long: A personal to-do list app to manage daily tasks. Add, edit, and delete tasks quickly. Features data persistence via localStorage and a light/dark theme toggle. Built to practice React best practices and effective state management.

booksearch.short: Web application for searching books by title and author.
booksearch.long: A book search tool that uses a public API to fetch results by title or author. Users can browse and view key details about each book. Great for practicing fetch API, error handling, and responsive design with TailwindCSS.
